'''Bloom''' is an upcoming [[Elemental Reaction]] in [[Version/3.0|Version 3.0]]. It is triggered by inflicting {{Hydro}} on a target that is already affected by {{Dendro}} or vice versa.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/6DjVUfy_Lng Sumeru Preview Teaser 01: The Fascinating Dendro Element]</ref>
